"A.D.2028/4/15/12:00": "This is boring, 100% boring! No one's coming out!"
"Instead of this 10% firepower, let’s just make everything go boom instantly!"
"Och...know your place. Don't forget our current goal."
"Yeah, yeah, I understand. I understand that 120%!"
"Sheesh, instead of this troublesome thing, we would be 100% fine with just me and Phul!"
"Phul still needs to make preparations for afterwards. You should understand that as well, Och."
"Stop nitpicking every little thing! 70% old man!"
"But really, Mother is such a worrywart! Isn’t that right, Laplace?"
"In fact, if Phaleg just blew everything away, everything would be solved right? Phaleg, let's just go ask Phaleg already!"
"So, do YOU want to go and ask?"
"No way!"
"Your breathing and heart rate are rising... Are you feeling nervous?"
"That's good to hear."
"Well then, you two. Until the time is right, I'll leave this to you."
"Yeah, yeah. Jeez, why did I get stuck working with this gloomy kid?"
"Hey, isn't a sneak attack kind of rude? One of the maxwells just got destroyed! Don't you feel at least 40% sorry for it?"
"Sorry, I was raised rather crudely. Cheating, weak points, traps, I’m going to use them all!"
"What? They deflected it all in a moment?"
"Impossible... you're..."
"Kohri! Why are you here?!"
"Wait, Kohri! Stop right there!"
"Tch! You idiot! Don't run off by yourself!"
"Hey, 60% sexy guy! Do you really think you have time to look away? You're going to 100% die like that, you know?"
"Don't get in my way, unless you don't value your own life?"
"Hey, you there. You're <%me>, right? I heard from Mother that, even among ARKS, you're 200% dangerous."
"That's why I'm here. I, Och Miller, came to deal with you personally!"
"Let's go, Laplace! Maxwell! All the calculations have been completed. This fight is 100% ours!"
"...Bring it on."
"Why are you there?"
"哀しき再会"
